title: Personalized Offer
description: Personalized offers form the set of choices for an offer decision actvity. The objective for decisioning is to take a large inventory of items and apply numerous constraint rules to that inventory to narrow it down and then to rank the qualifying options according to a criteria. The resulting propositions assemble and personalize the experience for specific individuals.
